EmailTemplate.name: RapidSetup-Email-GlobalStyleSheet
EmailTemplate.Body:
<style type="text/css">
  table {
		  border: none;
		  padding: 20px 40px 20px 40px;
		  margin: 0 auto;
		  color: #333333;
		  width: 100%;
		  border-collapse: separate !important;
		}
	</style>
EmailTemplate.Subject: Global Style Sheet
